TheAlchemist:BlindBrew.NAME: Blind Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain the effect of a random positive or negative potion.

TheAlchemist:Garden.NAME: Garden
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain a random #yCommon or #yUncommon #yElement #yCard

TheAlchemist:MagicBarrier.NAME: Magic Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a buff or debuff, gain #b3 Block.

TheAlchemist:PotionBox.NAME: Potion Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#ff0000]Potion [#ff0000]Bag NL While held, gain 3 potion slots.

TheAlchemist:Transmutor.NAME: Transmutor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, choose any number of cards to transform.

TheAlchemist:VirulentPoison.NAME: Virulent Poison
DESCRIPTIONS: Poison damages enemies and is reduced twice each turn
